long_description:
Blood splatter for players and **all creatures using Mobs API, Creatura (Animalia), VoxeLibre and Mineclonia.

Automatically gets removed after 5 minutes (configurable) or when mapblocks are unloaded (including exiting the game). Thus safe to uninstall at any time without leaving objects behind. Even works with complex blocks such as stairs, corners and slabs.

There is a particle effect  too. Both the node blood and the particle blood can be disabled in settings.

Based on GGraffiti by grorp
name: blood_splatter
short_description: Blood splatter for players and creatures
title: Blood Splatter
